LanguageData.HT.AllowOtherXenotypes: Allow non-baseliner xenotypes to use the pod
LanguageData.HT.AllowOtherXenotypesTooltip: If checked, any xenohuman can be transformed into a hussar. If unchecked, only baseliners can use the pod.
LanguageData.HT.ConsumeMedicineOnFailureTooltip: If the process is cancelled (e.g., due to power loss), medicine will still be consumed.
LanguageData.HT.ConsumeGoJuiceOnFailureTooltip: If the process is cancelled (e.g., due to power loss), Go-Juice will still be consumed.
LanguageData.HT.ConsumeComponentOnFailureTooltip: If the process is cancelled (e.g., due to power loss), component will still be consumed.
LanguageData.HT.StopOnPowerLossTooltip: If checked, the transformation will be cancelled if the pod loses power. If power consumption is 0, this has no effect.
LanguageData.HT.ResearchCostNote: Note: Changes to research cost require a game restart to take full effect.
LanguageData.HT.ResearchCostNoteTooltip: The research cost value in the research tree might not update visually without a restart, but the new cost will be used.
LanguageData.HT.BeginTransformationDesc: Select a colonist to begin the transformation into a hussar.
LanguageData.HT.TransformationCompleteMessage: {0} has successfully been transformed into a hussar.
LanguageData.HT.TransformationCancelledMessage: {0}'s transformation has been cancelled due to {1}.
LanguageData.HT.AcceptanceReport_TooYoung: Must be at least 13 years old.
LanguageData.HT.AcceptanceReport_NotBaseliner: Must be a baseliner (can be changed in mod settings).
LanguageData.HT.MissingStoredMaterialsMessage: Insufficient stored materials. Supply more materials first.
LanguageData.HT.SupplyGoJuiceDesc: Order colonists to bring Go-Juice to this transformation pod.
LanguageData.HT.SupplyMedicineDesc: Order colonists to bring medicine to this transformation pod.
LanguageData.HT.SupplyComponentsDesc: Order colonists to bring components to this transformation pod.
LanguageData.HT.MaterialSupplyCompleted: Materials supplied to hussar transformation pod.
LanguageData.HT.StorageCapacityFull: Storage capacity is full for this material type.
LanguageData.HT.NoAvailableCarrier: No available colonist to carry materials.
LanguageData.HT.AutoSupplyToggleDesc: Toggle automatic material supply by colonists.
LanguageData.HT.AutoSupplyEnabledMessage: Auto supply enabled - colonists will bring materials automatically.
LanguageData.HT.AutoSupplyDisabledMessage: Auto supply disabled - colonists will not bring materials automatically.
